respondent.name: Mr. Steven R. Brewster
respondent.address: 1162 W Main Street, Fort Wayne, IN 46808-3333
respondent.certification: I am a cigarette smoker 21 years of age or older and willing to receive free samples of cigarettes and incentive items in the mail, subject to applicable state and federal law.

questions.question: What is your regular brand of cigarettes-that is, the brand you smoke most often?
If your regular brand were not available, what other brands would you consider buying?
Do you usually buy it by the...
How long have you smoked this brand?
What, if any, was your previous brand?
The next time you go to the store for your regular brand and it is not available, what would you do?
options: Go to another store to buy my regular brand.
Buy another type or length of my regular brand.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes you?
Is there another smoker in your household 21 years of age or older? Please print full name, birthdate, and regular brand.
Would you be interested in receiving information about issues that affect smokers?
Would you be interested in joining a smokers group to help protect your right to smoke?

coupon_usage.question: Which of the following statements best describes the way you use cigarette coupons?
options: I use almost any coupon I can get.
I occasionally use coupons, even if they are not for my regular brand.
I only use coupons if they are for my regular brand.
I never use coupons to buy cigarettes.

special_offers_usage.question: How often do you use special in-store cigarette offers, such as a free gift with purchase, 2-for-1, or special prices?
options: I look for special offers for my regular brand.
I take advantage of special offers for brands other than my regular brand.
